name: Star Guardian (NonSenseiii)
description:
Since i did not have enough time to iclude these in the game, here are some things you need to know

Controls: arrow keys

GOAL:  You are a Star Guardian, your goal is to destroy as many enemy ships as possible.

Systems: There are two main systems that arent explained in the game - energy system and score multiplication. Your ship needs constant supply of energy, which is dropped by orange ships. Score multiplication works like this - The less hp you have, the more score you get for destroying enemy ships

KNOWN BUGS:  Game doesnt fit the window, for best experience use fullscreen; Menu isnt scaled properly; Score value is has decimal places; Getting score after death; 

If you have any comments or suggestion, please leave them below, it will be greatly appreciated.
